title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather requirements for the AI Code Style Guide system, including supported programming languages, coding standards, integration with development tools, user interface design, and deployment considerations.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall architecture of the AI Code Style Guide system, including components, data flow, and integration points.

title: Develop Code Analysis Engine
description: Implement the core engine for analyzing code and detecting style violations based on defined coding standards.

title: Implement User Interface
description: Develop the user interface for the AI Code Style Guide system, including code editor integration and reporting features.

title: Set up Development and Testing Environment
description: Configure the development and testing environment, including version control, continuous integration, and automated testing.

title: Implement Security Measures
description: Ensure the AI Code Style Guide system follows security best practices, including input validation, access control, and data encryption.

title: Write Documentation and User Guides
description: Create comprehensive documentation and user guides for the AI Code Style Guide system, covering installation, configuration, and usage.

title: Perform Quality Assurance and Testing
description: Develop and execute test plans to ensure the AI Code Style Guide system meets functional and non-functional requirements.

title: Deploy and Release
description: Plan and execute the deployment and release of the AI Code Style Guide system to production environments.
